title: Uber Shares Surge on Gains in Quarterly Revenue, Adjusted Profit
description: The ride-hailing giant’s revenue grew 72% from a year earlier to $8.34 billion, while adjusted earnings—which excludes some expenses—hit a record $516 million. Both figures were above Wall Street expectations.

title: Amazon Expands Music Catalog and Podcasts Ad-Free for Prime Members
description: Amazon is sweetening its offering as competitors increasingly bundle entertainment with other services.

title: YouTube Launches Streaming-Service Store
description: Google’s video platform is selling subscriptions to Paramount+, Showtime and others amid an advertising slowdown.

title: Why Google Plays Down Its Ad-Tech Business but Is Determined to Keep It
description: Facing antitrust scrutiny, the tech giant has resisted breaking up its ad-tech operations, which feed into Google’s larger ad business.
